label.en: 24/25 S regular part 2 3 CP LT Eng
label.et: 24/25 K PÕ 2. osa 3 EAP LT Eng

description.en:
In this course, the student will gain knowledge about the advancement in the research related to Data Science and experience by applying the knowledge to a concrete real-life problem. In addition, they will have the choice to work in an environment where they can grasp knowledge from other members of the team. 
The topics are related to Data Science and they are agreed upon with a supervisor.
description.et: Kursusel omandatakse teadmisi andmeteaduste kohta; omandatakse kogemusi rakendades neid konkreetsele probleemile. Lisaks on võimalik töötada keskkonnas, kus saadakse teadmisi teistelt meeskonnaliikmetelt.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to give students knowledge and skills for performing an applied project in the field of Data Science and related areas.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda õpilastele teadmisi ja oskusi andmeteaduse ja sellega seotud valdkondade uurimistöö tegemiseks.

objectives.en: The students shall get an understanding on how to conduct an applied project in addressing specific issues related to Data Science within one of the teams (Computational Neuroscience, Bioinformatics, Natural Language Processing team).
objectives.et: Üliõpilased õpivad viima läbi rakendusprojekti andmeteadusega seotud spetsiifiliste küsimuste lahendamiseks ühes andmeteaduse meeskonnas (bioinformaatika, arvutuliku neuroteaduse, loomuliku keele töötluse meeskond.)

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, the students will have learned:
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse edukaks lõpetamisel on üliõpilane omandanud:

learning_outcomes.en: -  How to use the theoretical approach in applied research.
- To work and interact with the supervisor and other researchers and members of the team.
learning_outcomes.et: - Kuidas töötada ja suhelda juhendaja ja teiste meeskonnaliikmetega.

learning_outcomes.en: -  To work independently under the guidance of a supervisor to fulfill an open project.
learning_outcomes.et: - Töötada iseseisvalt juhendaja abil etteantud projekti elluviimiseks.

independent_work.et: The student is expected to work independently on the topic agreed upon with the supervisor. The supervisor will provide sufficient consultation and collaboration opportunities to allow the student to successfully finish the project.

description.et: The student will be required to do a research project on the topic of his/her choice. He/she will also be required to write and present a research report.

grade_preconditions.et: A project plan is decided upon with the supervisor at the beginning of the project. To pass the course, the student needs to fulfill the goals in the plan.

grade_evaluation.et: The student will be required to do a research project on the topic of his/her choice. He/she will also be required to write and present a research report.

audience.et: The course is targeted towards master’s students in computer science. The prerequisites depend on the topic chosen and have to be discussed with the supervisor
